data.title: Conway Berners
data.meta_description: Conway Maurice Berners-Lee was an English mathematician and computer scientist.
data.text:
Conway Maurice Berners-Lee (19 September 1921[1] â€“ 1 February 2019) was an English mathematician and computer scientist.

Quick Facts Born, Died ...

Close

He worked as a member of the team that developed the Ferranti Mark 1, the world's first commercial stored program electronic computer.[2][3]

He was born in Birmingham in 1921[4] and was the father of Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the World Wide Web.
